trans-unit.source: This object contains the following members:
trans-unit.target: This object contains the following members:

trans-unit.source: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object where the query is ordered by the supplied column name arguments, in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object where the query is ordered by the supplied column name arguments, in ascending order.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object where the query is ordered by the supplied column name arguments, in descending order.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object where the query is ordered by the supplied column name arguments, in descending order.

trans-unit.source: Reads all data from the table and invokes the success handler specified on the <parameterReference>options</parameterReference> parameter passing in an array of results.
trans-unit.target: Reads all data from the table and invokes the success handler specified on the <parameterReference>options</parameterReference> parameter passing in an array of results.

trans-unit.source: You should not call the <languageKeyword>read</languageKeyword> method on tables of unbounded size.
trans-unit.target: You should not call the <languageKeyword>read</languageKeyword> method on tables of unbounded size.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object with the requested column projection applied.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object with the requested column projection applied.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object with the requested <parameterReference>function</parameterReference> projection applied.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object with the requested <parameterReference>function</parameterReference> projection applied.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object that skips the first <parameterReference>recordCount</parameterReference> number of records.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object that skips the first <parameterReference>recordCount</parameterReference> number of records.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object that returns the <parameterReference>recordCount</parameterReference> number of records.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object that returns the <parameterReference>recordCount</parameterReference> number of records.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object that is filtered based on the property values of the supplied JSON <parameterReference>object</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: Returns a <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object that is filtered based on the property values of the supplied JSON <parameterReference>object</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object that is filtered based on the supplied <parameterReference>function</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: Returns a new <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object that is filtered based on the supplied <parameterReference>function</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Query</languageKeyword> object is passed to read scripts.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Query</languageKeyword> object is passed to read scripts.

trans-unit.source: Query methods (<languageKeyword>orderBy</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>orderByDescending</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>select</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>skip</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>take</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>where</languageKeyword> all return a new <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object.
trans-unit.target: Query methods (<languageKeyword>orderBy</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>orderByDescending</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>select</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>skip</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>take</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>where</languageKeyword> all return a new <embeddedLabel>Query</embeddedLabel> object.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to compose queries as a series of method calls.
trans-unit.target: This enables you to compose queries as a series of method calls.

trans-unit.source: To see usage examples for the <legacyBold>options</legacyBold> object, go to <link xlink:href="b0644821-b4cc-45ac-847a-c5931bab87baopo" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">options object</link>
trans-unit.target: To see usage examples for the <legacyBold>options</legacyBold> object, go to <link xlink:href="b0644821-b4cc-45ac-847a-c5931bab87baopo" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">options object</link>
